CICERO TO QUINTUS IN SARDINIA

Rome, April 11, 56 B.c.

I sent you a letter before in which I wrote that our 1 daughter Tullia had been betrothed to Crassipes on April 4, and gave you a full account of everything else concerning our public and private affairs. This is what has happened subsequently.
